reviewComments: We enjoyed being at Meeks Bay by Lake Tahoe. Its a nice area for water play, picnics, beach time, camping, and fishing.
This is a small beach on the western side of Lake Tahoe. We arrived here in the afternoon to find that parking was limited and also full (costs $7 if you find a spot), so we... read more
Nice beach, easy parking. Good if you are meeting up with people. At this time of the year the water was very nice.
